name: DOMU/DOWN
description:
In DOMU/DOWN, you play as a soldier stuck in Möbius strip world. It is your job to protect the many DOMU from your geometric enemies for as long as you can. Trade with the DOMU to receive helpful power-ups that will assist you in your battle. How long can you survive before your efforts are overwhelmed?

Controls

Credits

Dallin Hoyt - Programming

Isaiah Stotesbery - Art, Sound, Programmming

Ethan Kendrick - Music

DOMU/DOWN was created for the 2021 Zeno Game Jam
